To see more about what we do, please click on the link below to watch the International Shipcare corporate video:

Contact us today and find out how we can help you ensure your vessel receives the best care during layup

Publication

“Ship Layup Guide”
In partnership with Witherbys and BIMCO, ISC provided technical input on layup practices for the“Ship Layup Guide” a comprehensive guide on industry best practices for ship layup. The guide book is fully illustrated and includes real world examples, reasons to layup and the various layup options available to owners.

The book is available in both hard copy and e-book format. Please click on the button below, should you wish to purchase a copy.

PURCHASE NOW
Reduce your cost with laying up your ship with us. The longest serving layup service provider in the world.

WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT

ESTABLISHED BUSINESS

With close to 50 years of operating experience, we are the pioneers at Brunei Bay, earning us a stronghold with relevant Government Bodies.

READ MORE

PUBLICATION

We have published 1st in the world ship layup guide book in 2019 in partnership with Witherbys & BIMCO

READ MORE

LAYUP OPTION

ISC provide advice on various layup options and procedures that need to be followed to ensure vessels remain secure and well preserved during the idle period, simultaneously reducing owners’ costs.

READ MORE

QUALITY ASSURANCE

We implement layup procedures developed from gap analysis of various class requirements. We are certified by LRQA & Lloyd’s Register.

READ MORE

OTHER SERVICES

ISC is a one-stop center for all vessel needs while in layup. This includes generator rental, ground haulage, and offshore transportation

READ MORE

SAFETY & SECURITY

We work in close cooperation with Regulatory Bodies, and authorities to develop layup related standards, safety practices and quality management. Watch our safety drill in collaboration with MMEA

READ MORE

What our Clients
say

 

We truly appreciate the effort put in by ISC when taking care of our vessels, and the successful completion of reactivation on a timely and professional manner. Thank you for your excellent support and cooperation

Wallem Ship Management Ltd
Fleet Manager

 

Thank you so much ISC, for the high level, unrivalled cooperation and support rendered all the time

Modec Management Services Pte Ltd

 

Owing to you and your good staff, our vessel could start Layup at Labuan smoothly and maintain her soundness during her laid-up period until today, for which we, Humolco would like to express our thanks

PT Humulco LNG Indonesia

 

Thank you for your great support and good cooperation. We will get in touch with you if she needs to do layup operation. I hope to get your good support then, again

PT Humulco LNG Indonesia

 

I have truly enjoyed working with you and the entire ISC team. As you know, I have never been to Malaysia before, and the hospitality that your country has shown me and my wife has been wonderful. Malaysia and ISC have been a highlight for me in 2020

Matson Inc

We hired International Shipcare Sdn. Bhd. (ISC) for Layup related service at Labuan, Malaysia for one of our chartered LNG carrier. It was great pleasure working with Pravin and his highly dedicated team. They are extremely professional in their approach on all things related to layup, and at the same time very flexible in understanding the last minute operational changes. We had so many issues related to procuring the specific bunker for our LNG Carrier with the deadline nearing for the vessel to leave Labuan for her next charter. ISC team played a crucial role in stepping up beyond their scope in trying to help us solve a number of challenges that piled one on top of the other. Finally the issues were resolved and the ship sailed out on time. ISC team really understand the client needs very well, and provide a personalised solution round the clock. I would definitely recommend Pravin and his team for the best layup service at Labuan

President, AG&P LNG Terminals & Logistics

TRUSTED BY GLOBAL BRANDS
